import React, {Component} from 'react'; import './leaderboard.css'; import AlfieImg from './assets/alfie-finish.png'; import CloseButton from './assets/16/icon.png'; import GoldTrophy from './assets/gold-trophy.png'; import SilverTrophy from './assets/silver-trophy.png'; import BronzeTrophy from './assets/bronze-trophy.png'; import StarImage from './assets/star-image.png'; class Leaderboard extends Component { constructor (props) { super(props); this.state = { isPopupActive: false, } } togglePopup = () => { this.setState({ isPopupActive: !this.state.isPopupActive }) } render () { const isPopupActive = this.state.isPopupActive; const RecapPopup = () => { return ( isPopupActive === true && (
{/* Close Button */}
{/* Title */} {/* Description */} {/* Subtitle */} {/* Image */} {/* Button Container */}
) ) } return (
{/* Character Image */}
{/* Points Total */}
1830 points!

{/* Finish Button */}
FINISH
); } } export default Leaderboard;
